subject: Re: testing client/server
msgSnippet: In my codebase, I have a simple client and server that should work if the server receives a hello message from the client and then echos back to the client.
messageBody:
In my codebase, I have a simple client and server that should work if
the server receives a hello message from the client and then echos back
to the client. How do I code this in Junit? It seems the with the
TestSuite multiple tests could run concurrently-- is there some way to
start up the server maybe sleep for a couple seconds and then run the
client test and shutdown the server?

Thanks, Jason (a complete Junit novice)
